mapper.insert: insert into calcu (calcuDay, calcuChngNum, printNum, openDay) values(#{calcuDay},#{calcuChngNum},#{printNum},#{openDay})
mapper.select: select calcuDay, calcuChngNum, printNum, openDay from calcu Where calcuDay=#{calcuDay}
select calcuDay, calcuChngNum, printNum, openDay from calcu where calcuDay> 0 order by calcuDay desc
